results.title: A liposomal formulation of simvastatin and doxorubicin for improved cardioprotective and anti-cancer effect.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_7955 @@@zebrafish@@@ larvae, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ treatment reduced @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@Dox@@@-induced @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac affection@@@, and the liposomes did not induce any sign of @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@Dox@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066126 @@@cardiotoxicity@@@.

results.title: [Sex, erectile dysfunction, and the heart: a growing problem].
results.text_hl: Thus, potent inhibitors of the P450 3A4 pathway may increase the plasma concentrations of @CHEMICAL_Sildenafil_Citrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068677 @@@sildenafil@@@, like @CHEMICAL_Cimetidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002927 @@@cimetidine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Erythromycin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004917 @@@erythromycin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Digitoxin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004074 @@@digitoxin@@@, and @GENE_1433 @GENE_1433 @@@CSE@@@ inhibitors (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, etc.).
